lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons and Dragons. Tonight, picking up from a crazy episode last week, we have Percy among us still.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hi! Ugh, my product!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway. Let's jump in here. First and foremost, tonight is our fantastic sponsor returning as often as they do and thank you so much, Loot Crate! (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Loot Crate. The theme of this month is horror. I've been dabbling in the hip-hop world lately, so I prepared a little rap. It's pretty street, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! No, you are not doing that right now!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have the hiccups!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So in conclusion, listen up, G, I'm down with Loot Crate and with OPP. Their swag is the bomb, and their threads rocks. You want horror? It's in the box! Word!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That made me sweat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Man. That went really well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That did not at all send hip-hop back to 1991.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Loot Crate, for allowing us, week after week, to have Sam do this. Thank you. Thank you, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty! Next up on the list.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hasn't even started yet! Laura, do you want to talk about merch stuff coming up here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Merch stuff coming up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Preorders are still going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, preorders for the hoodies are still going on, aren't they? How about that, guys? They're still happening. You can still order those for I think a whole other week. No? Am I wrong? I'm stroking out so hard. For another week!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Continuing the 1991 trend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That might be one of them. We'll figure it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be a Halloween treat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't know what we're doing yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. I also didn't tell Geek and Sundry we were doing this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura and Travis, you want to talk about another episode of another project you guys are working on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't worry about Catwoman. She's a piece of cat poop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you have it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a line straight from the game!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can look forward to that kind of writing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gears of War 4. If you got the Ultimate Edition, you can download it and you can play it early. As in, tonight. Which, you shouldn't do. You should be watching us. But you could do it after you're done watching us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's really great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fantastic.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: War harder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other couple of announcements. Really amazing isometric RPG that me and few of you guys have worked on. Liam, you worked on it. Sam, did you work on Masquerada?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Masquerada?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope! Me and Liam worked on Masquerada. It came out last week on Steam, and I believe it will be available on consoles later in the year. It's a great story, incredibly well-written, fantastic cast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt is very fancy in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Coming up towards the end of this month, too, Titanfall 2.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your trailer looks so good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Check that out in a few weeks, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all I'm allowed to say. I also play a guy. Yeah. Okay. That's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's as far it gets right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're basically in all the video games, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not in that one, apparently.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Apparently not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, well, Matt, are you in Blue Robot 13? Yeah. Are you in Verdant Lightning? Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are those real games?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, they're not real.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They could've been, though. I was nodding like, yeah, Verdant Lightning. I have that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be doing panels and signings and fun stuff there. Those of you guys in that vicinity, come say hello to us. Bring things and books to sign and bring questions for our panels, because we will be lonely otherwise. (German accent) And it would be a great time to meet you, and make your way to Another Anime Convention. We'll see you there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (German accent) We'll be doing these accents--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's your New Hampshire accent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (German accent) That's what they sound like in New Hampshire, is that correct? (normal voice) Last but not least, guys, please don't forget to vote.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Register!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Register to vote! You've still got some time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then vote.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god. Seriously, we're living in an Orwellian fantasy right now. Please vote.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll be there, waiting in lines at public schools just like everybody else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Individually. Like Santa Claus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Travis will be there at each individual one at the speed of light.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My voting center actually has a tank out front that's a National Guard center that we play on the tank. There'll be a picture of me with a tank later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we're going to pick up. Having just revealed through the somewhat transformed eyebrows, eyes, and upper face of the hairless, tattooed and scarred side head of Seeker Asum, you can see the reptilian green scales billow out and become glowing yellowish reptilian eyes peeking through. The voice modulates into more of a deeper, but thin, reedy hiss after Asum looks to you all as Raishan and says, "I wish to kill the Cinder King. Now, do you accept my alliance?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's it? We're just supposed to trust you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No! I assumed you'd ask questions. I'm an open book. What do you require?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why in the fuck should we trust you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You shouldn't, to be perfectly honest. I am a being that rides the line between what's true "and what's false, and I know your research has spoken the same. However, strange circumstances "make for strange bedfellows. And circumstances as they are, I think you have very little choice, as "do I."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you claim your motives to be?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thordak will experience all of those things. He will burn and he will suffer and you will not be there to watch it happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to feel the burning inside of you? Oh, you will feel it, Raishan. But it will not be from Thordak or whatever proposed cure he made up. The burning you feel will be from the souls of ten thousand Fire Ashari as they sear your flesh, and the last thing that you will see will be

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Child, I commend your bravery in the face of certain doom, but think before you give in to "such base passions. There is much to be gained by us working together, and so much more to be lost."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you commend me for bravery? Oh, Raishan, for someone who is supposed to be so smart-- I am not afraid! I know what you are. You are a parasite. You walk around calling yourself a magnificent ancient dragon. You are nothing more than a leech. You consumed the energy of my people for years! And we're supposed to just trust you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Child, your anger is misplaced--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) Call me child one more goddamn time!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I move behind Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thordak's release destroyed the top of that "mountain--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) Which you did! You unleashed the mad dog, you bitch! This is your fucking fault! (quieter) He's just a mad king. As you said so yourself, you're the master planner! But your plan backfired, didn't it? So now you've come to us, and you think that you can formulate some other master plan that's still going to somehow get you what you want! You dumb fool. When will you fucking learn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keyleth."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Raishan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do not mistake my grace in this room for need of conflict, nor foolhardy wishes. If I "wanted each one of you dead, I would be chewing on your bones right now."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think, perhaps, if I may be so bold as to tidy up what Keyleth is trying to drive home here, is that for all intents and purposes from this side of the table, you strike me as a desperate creature who's pretending that he has a choice to be here and has brought-- she, excuse me. That is another conversation. You've brought very little to the table. We are not impressed with your notions that somehow we can work together. You need us, and this is all you bring?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I bring information--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (scoffs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I bring knowledge of Thordak--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is Asum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know where Asum is--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is Asum?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's start with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's stop pretending you have a choice here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I infiltrated the ranks of the Clasp, gained his trust, which allowed me to find your whereabouts, "and so I came. He sent me on a mission to notify you of his plans, which, by the way, along with "Brotoras, Goldhand, and the Clasp's cooperation, they have a plan to strike at the Cinder King."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insight check. Well, hold on. No. 13. Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no reason for you to believe or disbelieve. It's just words to you right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's their plan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One that'll fail, of course. You see, they put their knowledge in what a red dragon is "capable of. They believe that by quelling the flames or stoking some nature of the crystal in "its belly's magic, there would be a way to stop him. And there is a path to be taken there, yes, "but their knowledge is faulty. They don't understand the nature of the enchantment, and "should they attack, they will burn in the flames of their own righteousness."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's your illness?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wish I knew the extent of it--" And you watch as Asum's form grows a little more green in places, the scales unfolding, and as the image, though still in the halfling form, where the scales rest you can see a series of deep, purplish-black veins that ride up the side of the throat, and across the chest and the arms, and they pulse with each heartbeat. "It withers my "constitution. It makes me weary. I've sat with this for nearly a hundred years. My brain is not "dull, but I wish not to have this brilliant intellect waste away into ash because I couldn't "find an answer."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you come before us and you tell us you're weak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, weak by my standards."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're weak by mine, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of these petty creatures that you call your "brethren, they live amongst their cities, and that's fine. My happiness lies in returning to my "home in the Rifenmist, where I can pillage the eastern and southern coasts. Or I can ride out "amongst the Viridian Ocean and steal what is necessary to survive and enjoy my network of "followers and spies. Far away from where you live."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You might as well be feeding us nursery rhymes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounds like a life happily ever after.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you're uncomfortable with my proximity, post the fall of the king, I will happily take my "presence elsewhere. Gather my people, my belongings, and find a roost, somewhere across the "Ozmit perhaps."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm comfortable with that being a conversation that happens later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, obviously, but I don't believe anything she says.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're sure that Thordak has a cure for you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have spent many years trying to untangle what could be the lie behind those eyes, and I am "certain. There is a confidence with knowing and withholding. It is stronger than the strongest of "bluffs, and I've seen that confidence in the Cinder King. A cruelty in that knowledge, that "smugness."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he still insane?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "By most standards, has been for some time, but it continues to slip. His narcissism grows to "dangerous bounds."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about the white dragon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Before we would consider any terms, we would need the white dragon removed from the playing field.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could be a good way for you to show us your loyalty, even though you have none. But know, Raishan, whatever deal we strike does not end in you leaving my sight. You're going to die. You're going to die, even if I have to die doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Amusing."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really, this is a conversation about whether or not we wait to try and kill you until before or after the Cinder King. That's fair, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You think that because you took surprise upon Umbrasyl, the brute, his inferior intellect, "that you will have the opportunity to strike me down? You have no idea what I'm capable of, no "matter what malady festers within me."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, we know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is your home, right, Percival?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It would be a shame for it to suddenly no longer exist."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we please just fucking kill her now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why I'm at the table. I am conscious of where we are, I'm conscious of who you are, and I'm conscious of what you need. I'm just trying to make sure that everybody's clear that the minute that red dragon dies, all bets are off. You know it as well as I do. And you should be wary, because only one side of this table is underestimating the other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which side is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I do a perception check to make sure that this being is actually in the room and is not just some sort of phantom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've seen this before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17. Oh wait, am I proficient? No, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, okay. The entity you see before you does appear to be physically present, to the best of your knowledge. No one's touched it or attempted to, but it does seem to be present with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I love a good story, so do you have a plan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One step at a time. White dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vorugal is a beast. Simple of mind. Eager to kill, eat, sleep. That's about the extent. As "long as it's given enough land and cattle to devour, it seems happy. It enjoys the hunt; it "enjoys the challenge."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How willing do you feel to be a participant in his demise?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A lot better if you'd be willing to shed a bit of blood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Get your hands dirty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, she's already done that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Once that's done, then you may pull your rug out from under me, if you will. I wish you the best of luck."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I assume once he's dead, either you'll turn on us or you'll run away. Either way works for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're getting a bit ahead of ourselves. Are you going to scrap with the white dragon with us or not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you talk him into flying off, leaving everyone alone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I want a dead dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You see, whereas I have the aptitude to know where my alliances stand, Vorugal is, of the "entire Conclave, the closest Thordak has to a lap dog."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So dead, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably the best bet, yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a question. Do you want to talk to Thordak's dead spirit, or are you after the big shiny jewel in the middle of his chest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no interest in whatever enchantment shackles him to his insanity. I merely wish to "draw from him the secret I've been promised."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Insight check to see if he's lying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ditto!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Insight check, both of you guys, go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that was terrible!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seems to be telling the truth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah, sure she does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's telling the truth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's telling the truth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once the white dragon's off the board, then we will hammer out whatever promises can be made, but until then, there's just many players on the field to say one way or another.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you been here as Asum this whole time? What have you been doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gathering information, like I do."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you do, sleep in his room like a halfling?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do you wear his clothes, and use his soap, and brush with his toothbrush?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I moved down to the stables and found a soft bit of hay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a lot of attitude to what I feel is a simple question. It's gross.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's pretty gross.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It must be so humiliating for you that you need to turn to us for help. You do have my pity in that regard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It isn't the most optimal circumstance, but I think we both have much to gain."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why do you think Thordak is the only one with knowledge of a cure?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because everywhere I've sought the information seems to have been destroyed by "Thordak once we made the accord."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you tell us what the disease is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because that puny little druid that cursed you-- well, don't forget you're dealing with a puny little druid right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You could take a look if you like, but I myself do not know its nature."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you tried Greater Restoration? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That seems to be the solution to all of our problems.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the chicken soup of Dungeons and Dragons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Chicken soup for the DND soul.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's feed a curse, starve perma-death.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please, go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, I have."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was the question?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've bent many diviners to my aid, and all have "failed! This isn't a simple magic, this was a spirit curse, this was something far more "powerful."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sounds like a job for me. (spits) Come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't have to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't want to."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Spit smells funny, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it two days until the white dragon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long do we have?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, will Thordak know if we do something to Vorugal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's likely. Very quickly, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keeps a close watch on his subjects. He's paranoid. Requires us to continuously "check in, which I have been."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've been checking in from where? Here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have my means in my room, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he know where you are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. As far as he knows, I'm currently somewhere on the outskirts of Westruun attempting "to forge some sort of vengeance for what happened to Umbrasyl."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If he did find out he was here, it would be very easy to turn the two of them against each other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So when Vorugal flew over... did he not sense you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm very good at avoiding the sight of those who would seek me if I wish not to be seen."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was he seeking you, or was he seeking Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thankfully, your allies put up some sort of illusory barrier, which I did not disturb during "that time, to whatever consolation that is to our agreement."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is of great consolation. In fact, I would go so far as to say that I am willing to say that these talks will continue post the destruction of the white dragon, so long as these talks take place in Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We won't have much time to talk after the destruction of the white dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll have enough. And if there is no Whitestone to hold talks in, there will be no talks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is true."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One moment. Game this out for me, friends. If this is all bullshit and Thordak has sent this little lady here to trick us into traveling with her to Draconia, where Thordak is lying in wait to kill us the second we get there, well, then if we're making a deal for this little lady to kill on our behalf, why do we need to go? Can we just stay in Whitestone and you go kill the white dragon for us? You're powerful, aren't you? Why do you need us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You see, if I were to utilize my full potential, which would be required to fell "Vorugal-- as idiotic as the creature is, it's still a very dangerous and cunning foe."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not for you. You're so clever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you can pretend to be Vorugal's-- something, pet hamster-- for a while until you kill him in his sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe I overestimated your intelligence, but in doing so, would immediately paint a target "on my back for Thordak. I think it's best that I remain in his good graces, as we all flank up "unexpectedly when the time is right."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm really enjoying that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would also say that if she wanted to set a trap with three dragons on us, they would all be here right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, they could've avoided it entirely and waited for us to go to Draconia, as opposed to having someone come by to remind us that we were going to Draconia in the first place. It seems like an awful lot of work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still don't really know why we need her to begin with. We're powerful enough. Why don't we just kill her now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honestly? Because it would damage the castle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, don't provoke--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that move? Don't do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you inviting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm saying the choice is yours. Either we work together, or you all fall."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on. Even my simple mind sees the advantages here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth. All we're debating is the order in which they die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was first on my list.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't recommend lists. The only reason I'm stopping you from doing this-- and I swear this is the truth-- is because this is my home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But this could be our best chance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There would be nothing left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could be the easiest--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Half-elf. Look at me. Your worldview is clouded by optimism that does not belong in "Exandria. There is good, there is evil, but this world has been remade many times because life is "destruction. You should know this as a purveyor of life in its own right. The cycle lives on. The "chaos perseveres. Everything grows, eats, then dies or is eaten. You can put whatever fine "dressing on it you like."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, shut the fuck up, sick bag.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's not making this easy to walk away, you guys!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy is right. We don't want the people of Whitestone to fall like the people of the Ashari.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: More deaths do not make it right, Keyleth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to get yours. You're going to get it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you telling me you have not claimed a life or two in your time? Do you think your goals "and your attempts to save those close to you have not been wrought with bloodshed?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I know the consequences of every step of my actions. It is you, Raishan, who did not realize the biggest consequence is standing in front of you right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you think you have not stepped on an anthill to get to your destination?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't give a flying shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I merely stepped on an anthill to get to mine."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're just fucking winding her up, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Understand, there are different levels of thought, intellect, and intent here. I come to you "because we have much to gain together. Or lose everything by not listening to what I have to say."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You will join us in the fight against the white dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will, if you promise to let Thordak's soul be mine."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope, that's not the deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're talking about a second round of negotiations.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will consider your offer once the white dragon is dead, not a minute before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This isn't a negotiation."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is everything of a negotiation, you fool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What am I getting out of this?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your life!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An opportunity to prove yourself to us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A cure to yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A chance to take down Thordak. You said yourself you can't do it on your own.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We haven't danced with a dragon that now stands breathing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your desperation is so obvious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We walk away, and you die. Or we stay, (whispering) and you die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I aid you with the tearing of Vorugal as a show of goodwill, in response, you keep my true "nature secret between those in this room."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You maintain that I have access to the length and breadth of Whitestone."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait a minute. Why the length and bread of Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Largely because I have interests in deciding my plan against Thordak. Let's just say "some of it may include a trinket or two that have come in your way on your travels."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you fully aware of what lies beneath Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have some ideas."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would you like to see it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have seen it already."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've been down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've been here for some time, my dear."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then why didn't we meet down there? Why are you so scared of it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, if you've seen it, tell us what it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. You know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course he--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You say it first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not telling you anything. That was not part of the negotiation."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Describe it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One dead white dragon and then--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh jeez, what is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Raishan snaps her fingers. You see a spark, and you notice a brief burst akin to a minor illusion. No sound, nothing, just the image of a tiny black orb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit! She's seen it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One dead white dragon, and then the negotiations continue. We will speak to no one of what you truly are, although we may caution others that we're looking a bit sideways at Seeker Asum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would recommend none of that. Any suspicion means I'm being followed. If I'm "followed and feeling threatened, the person you told may not survive. We do not want that, but I'm "going to look out for myself, so anyone you tell, you're putting in danger."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's also fair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyone you touch, you're then putting yourself in danger. If any of our friends wind up dead, we're looking at you first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fair enough."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you done anything with the rest of our friends?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's Asum? Did we already cover that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we already covered that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was very angry. I couldn't hear a whole lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whitestone will not fall. If Whitestone falls, all deals are off. If Whitestone is attacked, all deals are off. You keep it off the radar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's already off the radar. I just will not touch the radar."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is radar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you never go into my room? Do you never look at what I'm working on?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What room are we in right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the old war room, which is upstairs facing the front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The old war room, because we moved the new one down into the ziggurat and she didn't respect that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) Bitch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I said (singing) bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How big is the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about, I'd say-- close to 30 feet by 60 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many entrances?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's two doors that enter, and then two windows that face out the front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to attack her all of a sudden? Are you going to attack her right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should probably kill her right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree with that! Can I do a scan of the room, like a perception check to see if I notice magical traps or anything weird set up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Investigation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're looking for traps, it's investigation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, is there anything off? Does it look like there's an opening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a general perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can kill her whenever. Might as well use her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: General perception? 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has the two banners on the side walls. It has the table in the center with some chairs scattered about and there's the two windows opposite. One window that currently Raishan has to her back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think Scanlan is wrong. I think he is weak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: However, she will try to destroy as much as possible out of spite in her death throes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thus also exposing the city. We will be attacked. That will be the end of Whitestone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk up very gingerly to Keyleth, and I grab one of her antlers very gently, and I say: Look, if you want to go, we're with you, but if you exercise a little patience, I think we'll get more out of this, and you'll still get yours in the end.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Grog talking to me about patience right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's very important.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so extreme.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't get me wrong, I want to crack it open right now, but we'll get more later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's learned a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I guarantee you, the complete lack of satisfaction that you feel when she's finally dead will be just as potent two days from now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did Thordak tell you about the trinkets of ours that you wanted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thordak has no idea what lies beneath this city. Thordak is too obsessed with himself."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: About what we have, I mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you referring to your Vestiges?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She knows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You already told me everything. You informed me of your entire journey."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, okay! Because we're really smart and we totally--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We knew it was you all along. We want you to know what you're up against.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course you did."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taunting you all along.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We thought she was Asum. We talked, and she knows. She knows. We told her everything. What does he want?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What does Thordak want? Thordak wants everything. Everything. Thordak is using the "crystal in his belly to slowly build a volcano beneath Emon. To turn the surrounding city and the "countryside into a new mountain of his visage."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long until that happens?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's going to be another hundred years before the entire mountain is complete, but the "physicality is already adjusting. The molten rock begins to swirl and flow beneath the Cloudtop "District."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, you said he's building a volcano?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The energy he absorbed from the fire elemental plane carried over with him, and it's still "hungry. It's why he swells; that's why he's in pain. But he just laughs amidst it, as it also "gives him extreme power and nigh invulnerability."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you said you knew Thordak before he was trapped in the elemental plane. Was he, in any way, on what is now known as Glintshore before the elemental plane?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's possible. I have no knowledge of this Glintshore."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you know about the Briarwoods?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't think I know anything about some Briarwoods."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Really? What do you think about the wall surrounding that beach ball down there? It's a little creepy down there, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a little off-putting, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You expect us to believe you know nothing, as smart as you are, you know

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know what I've been told."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you sure you're not trying to summon something awful out of that marble?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you think I wish to have another creature that I pay subservience to?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe if he can heal you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Melora an enemy of Vecna? Do we know that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially, Melora is the goddess of the wilderness and the sea. Very nature, life, elemental-based deity. Vecna is not a god. Vecna was very powerful, wanted to become a god and was balked and scattered, supposedly destroyed a long time ago but the cults still endure and infiltrate and wander various parts of Exandria.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you want to do with that thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It pertains to what I think is a sound plan to bring Thordak down to our level."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, tell me a little bit more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will tell you, once we finish this next length of your journey, since you are so eager to "have made the agreement."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Makes sense.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you're lying through your teeth. I think you want something you're not telling us about, but I do want the white dragon dead, and we can work on it later.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's all agree that this is definitely bullshit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm going to disagree. I think that everything that she said is the truth, and I think that she's not saying an awful lot more. Deception is far less interesting if you're not telling the truth all the time, and I think she's telling a lot of truth, just not nearly all of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lies of omission are a tricky thing, aren't they?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're far more tricky than simple lies, and I think that we've heard an awful lot of truth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm confused.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So yes, I'm willing to work with what we have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have any ideas on how to defeat Vorugal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, for one thing, I will be peripheral to the battle. I will aid you, but I cannot be "seen on the battlefield, or Thordak will know immediately there has been a turn of allegiance."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So what good are you? What can you do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you shapeshift into other beasts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can change my form into a number of creatures and be of assistance in that way. I have "a series of arcane talents that I can bring to the battlefield, as well."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We needed a beast to bait Vorugal with.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have an idea with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I believe we're all on the same page.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's interesting is the way that stacks, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go ahead, or do you want to save it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we're in this together, can I say it in front of her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, don't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Once we get there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I say we agree on principle. We agree--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, we agree.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I agree. Hands?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we agreeing on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To fight with Raishan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm in this far.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't need our votes. It's already decided.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're abstaining? I really wish you would vote. Your vote matters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is voting this time important, particularly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jump on the carpet and go kill her, anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But if I don't vote, won't someone else vote for me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you actually sway the vote in greater ways than you can possibly imagine. Very important.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't even know how. Is it easy to find out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure the internet has all your answers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I should go online and find out how to register to vote.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look, it's never an easy choice, but you have to fall down on one side or the other, Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Preferably one that doesn't rely on hate as a message.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, we've gone far enough off the track. Okay, reeling it back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, Chris Hardwick as Gern, coming in for the political joke!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'm in, for now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth holds her hand out to shake her hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am drawing a blade behind my back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asum walks around the table slowly, making eye contact with you, those yellow, reptilian slits for eyes. Brushes past you. "You've grown quite a bit in just these few moments, young Keyleth."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I heat up my hands a little bit with my flame hands. Feel the burn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She stands there, keeping the grip, and then releases your hand. "Very well. What's your plan "against Vorugal?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need a moment. I feel like the emotions in here are a bit raw. Can we please?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plan for travel. Tomorrow morning to arrange travel and the battle plan towards--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shouldn't we keep an eye on this one all night?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? We haven't kept an eye on her the whole time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, but she could be sneaking around, creeping into rooms--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That she hasn't already creeped into?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can guarantee you you're not wrong, but I have been and I will, regardless of what you try."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She could come into my room at night and do things to me that I don't want to be done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's be honest, there's nothing--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's be fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're giving her ideas right now, aren't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not changing the status of the castle. She has the same status she had before, there's no sense in changing them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to have sex with every beast on every continent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, Captain Kirk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm content with this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. I'll go check in with the boss, if you will. Alleviate any concern on his end."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We shall meet tomorrow."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See you tomorrow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get an insight check on that "check in with the boss?" See if she's going to turn around and tell him everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, natural 20! It wasn't bad. It was a 15, so 26.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not a 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whispers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: While you're whispering, Sam's got another rap for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (rapping) Whenever I go to the Loot Crate, somebody kill me now 'cause of the embarrassment I'm experiencing, live in front of the Internet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey-o.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit. I was alive for that. I was alive for that just now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't have a sideways hat. I needed a sideways hat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The glasses didn't help, either.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is this? Manure Movers of America?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's my hat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The feather shirt really adds the whole-- (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, boi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Raishan looks very confused.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. See you tomorrow." The image of the veins, the scales, everything, reverts back to normal. Seeker Asum nods and leaves the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Downstairs, to the real room. To the real room, downstairs. Downstairs, to the real room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To the real war room, magically incapable of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, but wait, before we go down there, two things: Keyleth, can you scry today?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do not!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could check in on Vorugal. Make sure that Vorugal is actually there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't actually look at Vorugal, look at something near Vorugal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just to make sure Vorugal is in town and not here. We could look into Raishan's room right now and watch how it communicates with its boss.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Absolutely do not think that's a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think so, either. She'll know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's go down to the war room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're better than she is!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're really not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's obviously hiding shit from us, and if one of us goes and pokes our nose in there, she's going to start a draw, right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we in the war room? Can we go down and talk about this in the war room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys make your way through Whitestone through the tunnels to the location of the ziggurat. The war room is a series of tables and chairs that have been assembled on the top of the ziggurat, near the spinning bead of death, as you call it. But yeah, it's makeshift, it's functional. There's currently nobody else in here even though there are a couple of guards stationed to make sure that nobody comes in here without approval. You are currently stepping up to the top of the ziggurat, and there it rests, still spinning silently in place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Drop it on them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sit on the table. What's going on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, tell them your plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth screams her head off for a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did well, dear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know how hard that was. I know. And I wish I could say I did as well as you did, when it was my turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think I understood until that moment what you did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You'll have your day. Absolutely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't spy on her. Well, we

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If Thordak senses, sees, any one of us in the same place as her, he will go mad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then if I were her, I would destroy this city and all of us as quickly as possible and run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like she needs to talk to the spirit because she's going to try to absorb his power or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's a fucking idiot. What do I know about Melora and this curse? Because there are a lot of druids who worship Melora.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a religion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not good. I never do religion checks. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is considered by some to be good, some consider her to be in a neutral space and more of like a mother nature type entity amongst the pantheon here, if there was one. And as far as curses go, you don't have too much experience with curses outside of the minor ones that you've seen used or have yourself at your disposal. But even just from the few of you, Sam especially, Sam, go ahead and roll an intelligence check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who, me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need my thing. Hold on. Intelligence? Straight intelligence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, and you get to add your plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And if you wanted to, add your inspiration die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will inspire myself, which is d12 now, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, d12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. That escalated fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you die knowing, for whatever that means in that brief moment, that you have scarred the individual in some degree for possibly the rest of time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know anything about how it can be reversed or undone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you have no idea. You've heard of it in stories. And as far as you know, it was mainly a folklore element, and you're like okay, no, I've kind of heard of this. So if there was anything, this might be it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I worry about her intentions with this thing. Help me remember. When Pike has spoken to dead things, they cannot lie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who presumably cannot lie, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it could mean something to do with that thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I believe he holds the cure as sway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This whole thing could be an entire trap.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which means that we do have an ally for defeating the white dragon.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: And should use it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But then right after.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if the opportunity presents itself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or shake her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If the opportunity presents itself to kill her there, in a way that is fitting and where we have advantage, then yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Away from this city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In Draconia.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We never mentioned J'mon Sa Ord when we got back, so Asum does not know about that, or Raishan doesn't know about that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless she was scrying on us, which is highly possible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is highly possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have no way of having knowledge of when someone scries on us? They can do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sometimes we can notice, but often--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would have to have a super high perception in order to maybe sense it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If someone were to scry on you and you were to succeed on your saving throw, they would fail to scry, and you'd have some sort of inkling that something weird is going on. If you are a person who's capable of casting the spell like you are, you would be like, "Okay, someone's trying to peer "through the veil."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you would know. She would know if someone was trying to scry on us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless she--

lines.name: SAM, MATT
lines.text: If she picked up on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no recollection of that happening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a way I can start looking out for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can be very conscious of that possibility and keen on intercepting should anything like that occur, sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The other thing that can happen is we can set different forms of attack when we finally go against Thordak so that we have our mode of entry and the way that we are going to be moving that attack forward and make sure we have secondary lines of attack that she will have no knowledge of, that we will keep separated from her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any way to move Whitestone, to reinforce Whitestone, to get something here to protect Whitestone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A bit. But not a lot. There's just not enough time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many Vestiges are left?

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Two?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That we know of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Speaking of Vestige, this is part of the plan. So?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Spire of Conflux was born from Melora, so I'm wondering--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) The Spire of Conflux. That's why we've heard of her!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I've been thinking about that staff for a while. I'm wondering if I can get to the staff quick enough, it could be the key to really defeating Raishan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's resting in the belly of a terrible beast in the Abyss, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So. Gate scroll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Vorugal loves something to hunt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we bring it through, let it fight Vorugal, kill Vorugal, get the staff--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill Raishan. I like this plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not like anything could go wrong with it but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a good start. It's brazen. I like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no easy way to do this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know what that thing is that has-- what the beast is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Apparently, it's a goristro. A goristro?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I make a history check?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a barista?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no defeating a barista.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And she's really angry, because it's fall time. Pumpkin spice lattes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I'd say this would be a religion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not history, it'd be religion?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On what a goristro is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Specifically, this is knowledge of fiends is what this is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Apparently, his name was Yenk. Yank?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yenk. Y-E-N-K.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Yenk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All those yanks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One day, there will be a creature whose name we don't make fun of.

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Not this day!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And every creature you make fun of is going to hurt that much more when it kills you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are the Peter Parker of this game. We walk around mocking things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's great. It's so wonderful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's like this seventh ring of hell where they're all hanging out going, "And then "they called me Purvan."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "It's pronounced 'Purvin.' That's so much better."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I was named after my grandfather, man."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be a hard DC for anybody that doesn't have any specific knowledge or training in anything fiend-centric.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In anything fiend-centric?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A goristro is a fiend. It lives in the Abyss. Most things in the abyss are fiends.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said religion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I said possibly religion, if you have it trained. If you're proficient in religion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can Pike--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go ask her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll send one of the guards to go bring her in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wait about an hour. Pike quickly jogs up. You hear the clanking of the armor as she ascends the steps. "Hey, guys! Hi! What do you need?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Barely heard you coming that time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, thank you, Grog."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike, have you ever heard of a goristro named Yenk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything about a goristro?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fiends are bad, but I don't know anything about a goristro."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least you know how to pronounce it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have a library to consult?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What would be wrong with summoning it? What if it's really bad?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's a great idea. The worst thing that happens is it's going to have to fight two dragons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to know the beast that we are summoning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have its name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we know what it is. Can we go to a library, find a picture?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe Allura knows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where is Allura? We haven't seen her in forever. She's out--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They can't all be dragons!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have something to confess. I farted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh, that's all it took!" (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you guys want to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go research.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, can we go in the library and look in the books there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Okay. Who's going to the library? Okay, those two. What's everyone else doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need to talk to you for a minute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I stare blankly into space.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, Scanlan, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing for us to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you talking about? We're the masterminds of this portion of the adventure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right. What do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there somebody religious, outside of Pike, in the city? Oh yeah, ask Kash!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kash is in Vasselheim right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we do have priests. We have two priests.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have Keeper Yennen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure they know all about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, Grog and I will go talk to Keeper Yennen about Yenk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could also always pray to the Raven Queen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, you do have a shrine, after all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax and Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, that's a good idea. Let's go to the temple. I've been thinking a lot about your longer life that you told me about. Once you're leading your people, you've come into your own, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I live past killing these dragons, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A thousand years or so, yeah? Now, I've thought a lot about that, and I think we should make a point of seeing that it happens. Well, once you come out the other side of this. I want that for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, if we're all alive in a month, we can work that out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess we'll cross that bridge when we get there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I undo my cloak and shove it into her hands.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) Which cloak?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I only have one. Made from the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, the displacer cloak.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm so used to you smashing across our enemies, shoulder-to-shoulder with Grog, I get complacent. You're so strong. I know that. So much more powerful than I am. Lulled me into a false sense of security. But I can't have you gone. I need you here, so anything we can do to stack the deck in your favor. When you fell yesterday, it shook me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seems to be a trend, watching all of us fall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kiki, will you wear that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll have to attune to it on a short rest, but you can do that. While you guys are doing that, Percy and Vex, could you guys roll an investigation check, each of you? Percy, minus three, because you're still suffering resurrection issues.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Investigation? Oh! No, this has nothing to do with dragons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's okay. You're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you get a 20? Does it still count as a 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, a 20's a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still minus three. What's your total?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Investigation? 21, after that minus three. But this is a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see mention in there of various fiends and demons and princes of evil. It's all very thick religious text, but there is one page that has artwork on it. Sketched and simple, but it shows this strange, almost long, lithe vulture-like creature, with wings and clawed hands, and a beak-like mouth, called a vrock. You see another section that has a woman, but the lower half of her body is serpentine, like a snake, and she has six arms carrying six different blades. It says "marilith." Behind them, you see a looming creature of hulking fur and muscle with fists like battering rams, a turned up, pug-like nose with a toothy jaw, and giant horns adorned with brass rings that curve forward. Under that it says "goristro."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you find it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's intimidating.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's enormous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. I think the dragon will be pleased.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope the dragon kills it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm fine either way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's helpful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very helpful. Whoever survives--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We kill them. No problem. Anyway! And I leave. We should probably show everybody what we found.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It feels really third-grade in here, all of a sudden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The awkward pause dissipates, and you both bumble your way out of the library to find the others.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We both go out the door at the same time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you first--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, Scanlan, you guys make your way over to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are the worst people for this mission.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got this on lock!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's Keeper Yennen there with his small temple to Erathis, I believe. There's nobody in there, currently. It's empty. He's sweeping up with one of his assistants that's helping keep the place clean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tally-ho, Keeper Yennen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's been some time. I'm glad to see that you're all safe and sound."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, well. We come seeking knowledge that only you have. Maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I am at your service. What can I do?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We needed some information about something that is beyond our scope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe you should check him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Check him? All right. I'll check him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yennen, you keep your hands where I can see them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is very--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just keep them where I can see them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's got the broom in front.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to slowly touch his arms, make sure he's real.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your hands meet cloth and somewhat wrinkled older gentleman skin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll pat him down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find a small pouch, seems to contain a few coins. A somewhat stale piece of half-eaten bread. A couple of unlit candles. That's about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I sniff the bread. (sniffing) He's clean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. As you were.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most unusual."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't worry. Can't be too careful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's dragons around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, right. That's all right." He picks the bread up off the ground and puts it back in his pocket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry about that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're actually hoping you have some information on a fiendish beast named Lucas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Named Victor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yenk. Yenk. And he is a-- what's the type of beast? A goristro.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have come across texts that speak of a goristro. I do not know of one named Yenk, "specifically."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's very important that we know his name-- or her name-- accurately, because, well, for many reasons. But we need to know its true name. Is there any text you can point us to?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or tell us what you know of goristros.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They were dangerous front-line behemoths when the fiends attacked these lands, back in the "pre-Divergence era. They were 20-plus feet tall and living battering rams that tore through stone "like it was paper."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Force is their weapon, not fire or any magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know the specifics, but the texts I have read speak of it being an unstoppable fist in "the service of the Dark Princes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, now, we are totally up to date on how to fight these things, but we are also part of a group that's making sure you are at your best in case they come round here. If I were to ask you how to fight one of these things, what would you bring?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Everything?" (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An interesting answer. Might you be a little less vague for my simple friend here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do they have any resistances? Acid, poison, fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no idea, unfortunately. I'm not extremely well versed in fiendish things. I know a "bit offhand from my teachings, but it's a very specific--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I expected more, really. I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to play bad Grog, good gnome?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't even know if it's worth it, at this point. I expected more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you're going to guilt it out of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not withholding any information. I genuinely--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to protect Whitestone, right? See its people to prosperity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's what I'm doing."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, then, maybe you should

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've rebuilt half the city--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (voice breaking) Grog, I don't think I can-- I'm emotional thinking of all the people in Whitestone who are going to die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look what you've done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't keep it together. Is there any information you might know that can save your people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's tearing through his room in the back of the temple.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well done. You've got to lick your fingers and then wet--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, good, yeah. Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About ten minutes go by before he comes out, sweat pouring down his face. He's like, (panting) "I have nothing. I'm sorry."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have your orders. Don't make me tell Percy about this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That guy's going to go back to his room and flagellate himself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're shaking down our friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It may take a couple weeks. I'm so sorry."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a bad idea. You've done lovely work in here, by the way. The rebuilding effort looks great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to see that passion in the rest of your projects, that's all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anyone else who has knowledge that you can think of that we should speak to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're trying to put homes up for those who need them."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you for your service to Whitestone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Also, thank you for yours."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've had a weird, rough week, so sorry if we--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently, now so have I."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just curious, do you need any money for these homes? Or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Cassandra's taking care of the costs."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's sending up materials from the Turst Fields."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Isn't that right, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think we can talk our way out of this one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're top five in Whitestone, for sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate-- It's very kind."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're doing good work. (strained) All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have a lot of sweeping to do, if you don't mind."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did a good thing in there, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sebastian, stop staring and help me clean!" "Yes, sir!" They both start sweeping the rest of the temple as you guys walk out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to kill you someday.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We clearly got the most info out of anybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we got all there was. High-five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The two of you finally make your way to the recently constructed temple of the Raven Queen that Percy had built. What would you like to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to go in and have a moment. Pray.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever it is you need. Maybe it is selfish, but I seek vengeance against my mother's killer. Once I have it, I will go to the ends of this world for you. To help me go stronger, is there anything you can tell me about the fiend named Yenk? We need to use it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a religion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will stick with that. No, I'll stick with that. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some have already found secrets. I can only say "that the path you walked to the sphinx gave you what you need. Stay alive." You feel the lips fade from your ear. Warmth comes back to your sides, and your eyes flicker open, knowing that her presence is no longer there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any luck?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sort of. She told me something, but I'm too stupid to understand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think that's true. Gods really enjoy being vague. What'd she say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She said that the path to the sphinx told us everything we want to know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which sphinx? We've seen two now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She didn't say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it. Why do they have to be so cryptic?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because they can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come here. That's on crooked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a little baggy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here's to a thousand years of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That made me a little nauseous. Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys all go to convene in Castle Whitestone to discuss the next length of your plan, we're going to take a restroom break. See you guys back here in a few minutes. Thank you once again, Loot Crate, for being awesome, our sponsor. Thank you guys for sticking around. See you guys in a minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Is it Thursday yet?" Did you almost say "Is it Thursday yet?" [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before we get started, I wanted to bring this up in case you guys were not aware. I was made aware of it at the end of last week, but they announced Twitch Prime. What that allows is for anybody out there that has an Amazon Prime account you get automatically one free subscription to a Twitch channel of your choice, so if you are not a subscriber to Geek and Sundry's Twitch, to help support the show, and you have an Amazon Prime account, you can do that now, free of charge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll be in the chat room; you'll get all the goodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Picking up where we left off, the rest of you guys have done some research, gathered some information that may or may not be helpful. What do you want to do for the rest of your preparation for whatever you wish to do going forward?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is before beddy-bye time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys are still--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've a few things I think we should do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think there's a lot we need to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First, I think we should brew some tea and not drink it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. It only lasts for how long?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The venomous tea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll probably last for the day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, yeah. It'll last for 24 hours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So wait, you want to make poison and not do anything with it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll keep it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just in case.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In case someone comes over for tea?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Emergency poison.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why wouldn't you make it in front of her, and then it's

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) That's true! Let's make some and put it a flask, and then we'll do it later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you talking about for Raishan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, just to have some poison.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's a poisonous dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just to have some poison in general. Not necessarily for Raishan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe we'll make it in the morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe an enemy will come over. You're right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe an enemy will come over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a specific master of dragon and dragon knowledge, so you're aware, green dragons are--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Poison by nature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think this is for Raishan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was actually thinking if we had a bit of poison and if we could get it into the system of one of the larger creatures at some point. A big pot of poison, maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I knew you didn't think it was for Raishan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Raishan's not going to drink tea and die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, internet? We knew it wasn't for Raishan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I want to go downstairs, and I want to see if Grog will give me all of the guns to go upstairs and look at our giant cache of guns that we suddenly have.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: All the guns.

lines.name: SAM
