lines.text: That reminds me. On the walk home with Grog, I turn to him and say: Oi, Grog, got any of those guns?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two pistols, two rifles, really long skinny guy. And I've got a greatsword.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why should Percy have all the fun? What say you and me take a pistol each, just as a backup plan? An insurance policy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want a pistol. How about you take one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't want a pistol?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'd look so cool!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not as intimate as what I do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are about the personal touch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need the connection.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are the actual chances that he will even know how to operate it? I'm not talking to either of you. I'm talking to the powers that be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It'd be like a little GI Joe handgun. Do you want a pistol?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have any ammo?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do. I have 185 rounds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I take out one of the two pistols. Do they look the same?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look comparable, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any blood on either of them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little smattering on each of them, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll give you the super bloody one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want the bloody one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! I toss it to him, and I give him--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six ammo. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) 15 rounds of ammo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Grog. Thank you very much. I don't know what to do with this, so I'll pocket it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm pretty sure if you look into it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't even encourage that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've seen Percy do that a lot. Stares right down the barrel and make sure it's working.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's where the expression comes from: "right down the barrel."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't do that at home, kids. Just don't do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you go looking for Grog who is not around the castle, and eventually, as you step out, you notice Scanlan and Grog both walking up the pathway to the front of Whitestone Castle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh good! We need to go through the guns, we need to see what we have, we need to clean them up. I've got a plan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, right, yeah. We need to-- (sniffs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do. I need to clean up the guns.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who has those guns?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You do. That's right; you were very clever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What you have?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a book. It's a very nice book.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you joking?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! No, I have a cloak. Would you like a cloak?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The guns. I thought we were making a trade here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, we are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, do you want a cloak, then?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A Vestige?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does it do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It looks smashing, and it's quite warm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a cloak of smashing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, it is a cloak of smashing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Deal. All right. I will trade you that for the long barrel thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll need them all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In a minute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I need them all. I really don't have anything else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't have any guns? What happened to your guns?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, no. I need to clean--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about your glasses?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (chuckles) I sort of need those glasses--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give me your glasses. Just let me hold them. Show us some faith.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're friends here, right, Grog?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is everybody here? Is everybody watching us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the three of you guys and three guards back by the front of the castle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what he's doing. I would not trust him. But then again, you don't have a choice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't trust him, either. I did have siblings; I'm aware of how this happens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many fingers am I holding up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was he right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was right!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know why you need the glasses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I need the glasses because I can't see things that are up close. I can see things that are far away perfectly fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many fingers am I holding up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very well. You passed. Glasses. And I give him the two rifles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He also has Ripley's gun?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we come inside so I can explain to you my plan so that you can feel good--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, this is very important for me out here. I have a position of power, and I'm not about to give it up. What else have you got?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a title. I can title you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes! Title him!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would you like a title?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take note, Scanlan: this is how you get shit done. I'm listening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I will title you if you give me everything that I need. I need all the ammunition, all the guns, especially the complicated guns. I'm going to need everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I have one other pistol, I have 170 rounds for the little bitty guy, and I've got 26 rounds for the (belches) rifles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want the full plate armor and the greatsword, too?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, plate armor and greatsword are completely up to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (belches) Okay. I give it all over. What's my title?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grand Poobah de Doink of All of This and That.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grand Poobah de Doink of All of This and That.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm unfamiliar with protocol. A Grand Poobah, how do you address them? Is it a "your Majesty," a "your Highness," "your Grace?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No it's "Hey you, over there." "Hey, you guy."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, you guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, my humble servants.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Sweet chestnut."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are those all official names?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yes. They're used in very different ways.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well look, let's keep it on the low-low, right, I don't want too many people getting jealous, so like only in private quarters will you address me by my

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, or the shortened versions thereof.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, which I look forward to learning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You will enjoy them. I'm sure we will all enjoy them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a great day, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is, right? Man, I just keep coming up in the world. Coming up, against all the odds. I feel like an Eminem song in the background right now. Eight Mile, bitches. Let's go inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Didn't even bother to insight check, did you? That's great. That makes me so happy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy, don't forget, you promised me one of those guns.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd actually have to teach you how to use it, you are aware of that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe you can teach me first, and when I've learned, you can give me one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe we'll have that conversation. I'm going to take a look at their various levels of repair. I want to take a look at how they look, how many of them need work, how many of them are at least functional.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of them need work. A number of them backfired during the actual battle, and the other ones were not taken very good care of, so you're probably going to need to run a few repair checks on that. You have the materials at your disposal, you have your workshop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do this not in private, but I'm going to be, then I want to look at Ripley's gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take a good solid look at Animus, get a feel for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Travis.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (belches)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was Laura Bailey-esque.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I find Vax while he's looking for the gun?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to go find Vax and Keyleth, as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry, I meant Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to find me? Hi, what's up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, so remember when you showed me your boobies during the fight with Kern?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you saw them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only out of the peripheral.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, so if they ever get jacked up again, heal them, because I fight better with boobies around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll remember that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Deal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you so much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is mean.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was spectacular.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I missed everything. I'll watch it on the preview because this is a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Isn't it breast cancer awareness month? It is, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now I'm aware.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Check your boobs, ladies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's important.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't let them get jacked up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to do my best to clean and work on these guns tonight, and at some point, I'm going to send a guard to find Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you've gone and looked for Vax and Keyleth. After you guys had your conversation about everything, eventually you catch up to-- are you guys still together? Yeah, so you find the two of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, did you find anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sort of. I wanted to talk to you and probably Percival, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I communed with my deity--

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: The Raven Queen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the one! And she said something that I don't know what she meant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I asked about this Yenk, and she said everything we needed to know we saw on the way to the sphinx.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I said!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She didn't say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm drawing a blank, I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything we need, we saw on the way to the sphinx.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What happened the first time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's here--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was under the Slayer's Take.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, under the Slayer's Take.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But there was a ziggurat, as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Then the second time--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We went down a cavern, and there was a name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right. Had to do the whole name trial.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog almost drowned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So the first one was near where the Cindergrove is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, and she worshipped the goddess of knowledge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Osysa was her name.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just spoke to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Osysa was the gynosphinx who works at the Slayer's Take. The goddess she worships is Ioun.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Ioun!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So maybe we need to talk to Ioun, no? Maybe we just talk to a god. That's impossible unless you're--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just did it, yeah, but I didn't understand what she told me, so six of one, half a dozen of the other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Worthless, really. Yeah. That's a nice cloak you have there, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a little baggy, but thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I gave you a cloak once, and you stopped using it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is true. It looks lovely, though, stacked next to the rest of my clothing. Do you want it back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I do not want it back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He only gives cloaks to those he really cares about, Keyleth. Really cares about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is really awkward, and I'm going to walk the fuck out of here. Good night, ladies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got a wink from Vex!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go off looking for Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While they share their awkward smile, you find Percival down in his workshop, currently repairing weaponry with Ripley's gun placed down out on its own in the middle of the table.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, good. It's you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you mind?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not at all. I was actually hoping you would stop in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gods! What does all this shit do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mostly break, quite successfully.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just like us. I just broke in the temple that you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I assume it was vague and unhelpful?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First, I don't think I ever officially thanked you for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you. How are you feeling, buddy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) I'm terrified, but other than that, I think I'm good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I asked about Yenk. I asked what we should do, and she talked about the sphinxes. She said that everything that we needed to know we learned on the way to the sphinx. I don't know which one? I don't know if it was the gynosphinx or the not-gynosphinx?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would assume it was the sphinx that was guarding her treasure. Oh! You should take a look at this. And I point at the open book with the picture. Look what we have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, is that Yenk?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's one of Yenk's brethren.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you follow me down here? I said I didn't fucking want to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, obviously Keyleth's there, so I figured I was, too!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought you were working in the middle of--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My door's open. I'm in my thing, but it's open, and I've already sent people to send for--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I said "Hi, Percy." It's not my fault no one notices I'm around. It's not my fault I'm a fucking wallflower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You scared the shit out of me. This is some nasty business. This is what we're dealing with?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, and if all goes well, which it never does, that will be fighting the white dragon, and possibly the green dragon. And one of the two of them will kill the other, and then we swoop in and clean up what's left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if it's smart, but I'm really curious.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. I understand; I feel the same way. It's probably not going to work. It's probably going to go terribly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it might.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it might work. I'm feeling good about that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we even know how to use the Gate scroll exactly? Scanlan has to use it, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, the little guy can pull it off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's going to have to be either Scanlan or me but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, guys!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan! Hey!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Door was open, thought I'd come in. Grog's right outside in the hall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Grog! Come on in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you ever been here? Look at all this fucking esoteric bullshit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's crazy! Is that a brain in a jar?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not a brain, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's that a picture of?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's the goristro.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. What are the other ones?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, one is called a snake lady. A marilith.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they all together, or is it the one guy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's just the one guy. Hopefully, other things can't come through. Can they? Read that scroll again, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, my Gate scroll? Yeah, well, I left that at home today, but I think it calls the thing that you call for. You give it a name, it goes, it grabs it, it brings it in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't bring other things through? Doesn't leave the gate open?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The gate does stay open for as long as your conjuration, which is about a minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So other things could come through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, that is true--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you could close the gate once it passes through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could drop it, yes. However, this is a tricky spell for me because I am not-- as much as it pains me to say this, I am not good enough to cast this spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're selling yourself short.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm really good, but I'm not quite that good, so I can cast it, but it carries a risk. If luck is not on my side, it will not work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, it burns when you pee risk, or it's going to fall off in three months risk?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I don't do it right, it's gone forever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we talking about your penis, still?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. My penis will fall off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is terrible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We will have Raishan with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not giving this thing to Raishan. But do we know anyone who is at a slightly higher skill level than me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Allura or Gilmore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, Kima wanted to come with us to fight the white dragon, remember?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she an arcane caster?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's not, but if Kima is going, then maybe Allura will.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can't bring them. We'd have to tell them that Raishan's with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we wouldn't. Raishan will be in disguise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Raishan has had everyone fooled for a long time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know where Kima and Allura are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't checked in to see if they're here or not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, they could be at the castle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They wouldn't be at the castle. They stay at one of the houses at the northern end of the city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should I call for a guard?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Call for a guard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (loudly) Guard!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's one literally down the hall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. (stage whisper) Guard!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who has now arrived and steps up. "You called, Grog?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, please don't use my official title. If you would, could you go see if Lady Kima and Lady Allura are around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you wish for me to fetch them?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Go forth, quickly, with haste.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rushes off. You hear the armor and chainmail clinking in the distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's mid-afternoon. You guys have spent the day doing research and checking things out. You woke up in the morning and you had your conversation with Raishan, so it's two, three in the afternoon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have another question. How far are we, timeline in the year? How close are we getting to Winter's Crest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are close to three months past it, so you have a ways to go before it's Winter's Crest again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When's the next solstice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The celestial solstice? You're not sure, actually. Make a nature check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's not a summer solstice and winter solstice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are solstices, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. The next solstice is going to be in about a month. Roughly 28 days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whatever relevance that has.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So none at all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I see what you're getting at.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thordak was busted out on the winter's solstice, right? Also, the Briarwoods were rushing to try and get the ziggurat up and running in time for the solstice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. Important day, is that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Very important day, where nature and stars tend to align and planes can blur a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I ask a quick question? I really like this plan to use the gate thing and go attack Vorugal. I don't even feel like we need Raishan for it. Shouldn't we lure her away to somewhere and then fucking kill her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The sooner she dies, the happier I'll be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We get her over there, and then we kill her afterward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we'll be weak and she's on the fringe, because remember, she's barely helping out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is she going to be doing to help us, anyway?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We haven't decided.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She was going to be another magic user, dressed as a human, or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like tricks, but Ripley got us pretty good, and I don't feel like walking right into another trap one week before another fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's better than nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She'll spend some power.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have to get her away from Whitestone. We have to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I guess we couldn't get her anywhere with a low ceiling, where her dragon form doesn't have such an advantage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think the ceiling would give.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I mean a cave or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vorugal lived in a cave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but a little cave. A cave that Asum would fit in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That wasn't a cave, it was inside a chasm. A giant ravine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think far away on another continent is a great idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about the little cave in Glintshore?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm happy just to take her. She's going to follow us already.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, here's my question. I'm sure she's anticipating us turning on her. What would you do if you were a green dragon anticipating people turning on you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It depends. If I needed them, I would put myself in a position of safety, make myself useful, and then make sure I was back somewhere where they would not attack me as quickly as possible. If I didn't need them, I would turn on them immediately after the fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's going to put out the barest amount of effort to help us from behind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we die, her plan foils. If we do not feel she put in enough effort, her plan also foils.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I picture Thordak going, "Raishan, use your treachery and intellect and go kill Vox Machina."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My feeling is use your treachery-- Where are we? We're in my shop right now? Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keep that in mind. We could be getting spied on. Are we being watched?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no sense of being watched by any exterior force.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's no surprise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can keep playing with her for a little while longer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She can sense lies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, so we buck up. We go through with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We go through with it. We made an agreement. I say we honor it until such point as it is deeply inconvenient.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I go find Zahra?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax, your boy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Arguably so, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your boy. I'm thinking of creating a company of shot for the castle with these guns. Do you think that would be a position that would suit him? Guards that would be forbidden from carrying these weapons outside the walls of the castle itself, and would arm the parapets if there was an attack from a dragon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do. I don't know how good a judge of character I am, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hopefully, a better judge than I am.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There has to be room for a little bit of redemption in this world.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm a big believer in second chances. At least, I am now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a good idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wanted to check with you. I thought this was something that I assumed you would have some insight into.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we have time to teach them how these things work?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He may already know a bit. He spent some time around them, which is also why I thought it might be helpful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to talk to him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm still not 100%. We are going to be fighting these dragons, and I am not at my best.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you probably need to get to bed, but why don't we go find him before it grows too late?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll continue to work on these. Bring him down when you find him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will. Thank you. I head out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Percy, can you make three tinkering checks for me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tinkering check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stop that. Where did all my dice go? Okay, apparently I have three. Dex, proficiency, if I recall? Okay. That's a 29, a 27, and a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: During that time, Keyleth, you were going to mention something, you said?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And Zahra.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did you say about Ioun, and why is Ioun important right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's also what the ziggurat beneath the city used to be: a temple to Ioun, before it was corrupted by the Briarwoods.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, do you still have those Ioun stones?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have an Ioun stone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Was Raven's Slumber the name of the temple?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my necklace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's your necklace that's got Trinket in it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When we're not in the city. He's out of the necklace. Yes, he's always around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we go back to that temple?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And do what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax is gone right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm also gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's been helping me clean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Never mind, keep going. I'm just trying to figure this out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Vex, you go ahead and find Zahra, who's in the process of still researching in her room, her and Allura, while she was focusing on the ziggurat and the essence of it. So you find her and her tomes are spread out, and she's actually fallen asleep on her desk in her room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Knock-knock? Zahra?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Darling, I'm so sorry! I didn't mean that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you? How are things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tiring, if anything." She wipes this bit of drool from the side of her chin. Immediately sits upright in her chair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I never noticed the drool, don't worry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "Good, just trying to figure out what we can from these siphons."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything interesting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not yet, though it's been a lot of fun throwing things into them and watching them go away."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Speaking of, you've been very busy, I know, with all of your research, but do you remember what we spoke of before we left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Remind me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Arrows of dragon-slaying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, yes! I was able to muster one."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that's wonderful! One is better than none.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is all I've been able to get done in time." She pulls out a small case and opens it. It looks a little roughshod, not quite as perfect, but she says, "The enchantment took."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wonderful! This is costly, what do I owe you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, for this?" Let's find out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope this isn't a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 5,000 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would come to roughly-- on the market, about 30,000 gold pieces."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But she made it, so that's not how much it would be, right? Zahra said it wasn't that much before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Okay. But that's 30,000 gold pieces?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, for cost and time. I'd put it more about 12, for a friend."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus. Man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Better make it work, then. Better wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll wait. You keep making this awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Sorry dear, I haven't had a lot of time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (dryly) No. I know you're so busy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mark it back down to one in my-- Zahra, you're amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (dryly) No, it's great. It's super cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going into battle pretty soon. These fuckers are pretty dangerous, so I'm concerned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So should I balk on the research and focus on--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep doing what you're doing. If you find the time--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Noted."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Zahra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No worries, dear. I should make some tea." She rubs her eye a little bit, gets up. "Have a "good night, Vex." Walks by. As she exits the room as you stand there, her tail whips you in the back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I deserved that!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mary is going to see this!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mary said it was only five, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mary says a lot of things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did Kima and Allura show up yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima shows up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kima shows up? Kima!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she walks up, it's midday. She's not armored at all. She's wearing a standard linen shirt that's sweat through. It looks like she's been doing physical labor work and she comes up with dirt smeared in her face. "Grog, it's been a while!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It has! Yeah, you little badass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "You big badass. What can I do for you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Yeah. The thinkers are inside the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey. Where's Allura?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you need me to get her, as well?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, the guard was supposed to get you both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, she comes back with Allura. Allura not quite as dirty as Kima. They both arrive. "Hello, "I'm glad to see you've returned. Can I help you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I don't normally need to ask for help with magic, but this Gate scroll that I have here, is this something that you can do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is beyond my magic."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Forget I ever showed it to you. Doesn't exist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, this is incredible. This is very powerful magic."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know it's really cool, but you shouldn't know about it. It's bad news.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think it has quite a bit of utility, to be honest. Do you need this, or could I--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I do need it, desperately, yes. It's very vital to our mission.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, all right."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa, wait. Do you have a use for it in mind, in particular?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, this is the kind of spell that I could copy into my spellbook, and once I'm able to "utilize it down the road it would be at my disposal."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would that make this scroll inactive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It would destroy the scroll, but I would be able to utilize the spell in a few years, maybe."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long does it take to copy down the scroll? A couple seconds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It takes a few hours, maybe."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is this voice I'm hearing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just wandered back. I'm done talking to Zahra. Hey. The door's open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be careful with that. From what I can glean from the enchantment, it offers you quite a chance "to pull pretty much anything to your side, but no real bindings on what you pull through."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. I think I understand how it works, but I don't know if I'll be able to do it when the time comes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No bindings on what comes through? You might get more than you bargained for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are many a mage who ended up trying to bend something to their will and weren't seen "ever again."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think what she's referring to is once we pull the thing through, it acts of its own volition. We can't tell it what to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We stay clear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. But will its friends come through?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably is good enough for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Once we pull it through, how do we keep it in place long enough for--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't, we pull it through right in front of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we get in front of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could be invisible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please don't let us disturb you any longer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No worries, I'm about to ready continuing to strengthen the veil with Shaun--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also I don't know if you'd heard, but Tiberius fell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. I'm sorry to hear that. These are dangerous times. I've got something I've got to "do. Stay safe. Be careful with that." She walks out of the room, a little dazed, and rubs the top of Kima's head, and you watch her leave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How is she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's stretched a little thin these days, to be honest."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Her and Gilmore both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which I despise. Where are you guys off to?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, something you might enjoy, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really?" You see this big, toothy grin curl across her face, and her fingers twitch. "So?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Feel like killing a dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (excited chuckles) "I was hoping you'd say that! Let me get my armor. How soon? When?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pretty soon. We only save you for the big fights.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All righty! Stay right here. I'll be right back!" She darts off with a spring in her step and a little chuckle as she heads down the hall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Quick, before she comes back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? It would be the best bag ever, come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Won't she ask why Asum is with us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here's what I think. She's going to find out eventually, and then what do we say when they all know we've known the whole time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, when we start attacking Seeker Asum, then we kill Kima. What? She's probably a dragon, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. I totally did that, didn't I? But she wanted to come! And fight the dragon. I'm an idiot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was our agreement, not tell, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But then what happens when Kima goes, did you guys know?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. She didn't ask.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Paints us as pretty shady folk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They are our allies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She has kept secrets from us, and we have a perfectly legitimate reason for not telling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm with Percy on that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was also years ago!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we have a very-- fine! We still have a perfectly reasonable reason for not telling anyone, which is that if we tell people the city gets destroyed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And they get destroyed!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are welcome to tell her, and then we have to deal with the city being destroyed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus, Kima is a total bash brother, and if she gets to find out she gets to kill two dragons instead of one, I don't think she's going to be upset.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, we're putting her in a lot of danger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As opposed to staying here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we were aware, and we could have told her. She going to be angry at not telling her the full parameters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She will.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's working on the outside of houses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is not someone we want to lose our trust.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She could help protect the city, it could go under siege.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's a soldier. They're used to not being told things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, she is not a soldier in our manifested army! She is our friend and ally. There is a difference right now. This is a different duty and relationship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like I got us into this, and I'm really sorry about that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can get her out of it really quickly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can tell her not to come.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can tell her that it never happened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You saw how excited she was! It's her choice! If she's our friend and ally, let her choose.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She'll choose a fight every time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But she'll choose a fight unaware of exactly what she's getting into.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we can make that clear, then. Tell her that there are aspects of this fight that sadly must remain secret, that it's far more dangerous than we could possibly even explain--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, what he said.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that things may go completely tits-up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She is going to push until we tell her what happened.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even if we tell her the truth, she's still going to want to come.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So then either we tell her the truth and trust that she can keep a secret, or she doesn't come. She's going to find out, and I don't want to lose her trust.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't want to tell her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm happy for her not to come because I don't want to tell her, because I don't trust--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't trust anyone right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I barely trust

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god, honestly. All right. To a vote.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we voting on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whether we bring Kima or not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's going to be mad at us either way, so it depends on if she's mad at us now or even more angry at us later.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want her to fight a dragon. All those in favor of Kima

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're abstaining?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I grab my earring. I'm like, Vax, where are you? Can you hear me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sure I'm more than 500 feet away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, look, she's then going to wonder why we uninvited her. We are lying to her no matter which way we take right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you want I can wipe her memory of the fact that we offered--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If she finds out, she is going to be really super pissed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm okay with this plan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Removing an ally from a fight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like she should come.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Taking one of the guns and going, nah! I want that gun to trust me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, I want her there more than anything. I don't want to lie to her and I also don't want her dead and I don't want to drag her into a situation she could have known more about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I defer to the Grand Poobah's will. I will change my vote to yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There could be ears listening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know. Don't worry, I'll wipe their minds, too. Let's bring her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You really won't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're bringing her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. And what's our plan? Do we go to sleep and wake up and go? How do we get there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We go in the morning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are we getting there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tree Stride.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to burn her spell in the morning to get there? Shouldn't we go now, sleep there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I was assuming we would go there tomorrow, set everything up, and then have it happen the day after. We can go camp in our house, deep in--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With Raishan? In

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: By the way, that two-week time period we had. How far into that are we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two days?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you got a handful of days left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Just checking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We go there, we set up. Raishan can handle herself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fine, let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going? Well, you know what? I've got to handle something first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While this is happening: Vax. Eventually, you find your way to the makeshift training barracks that are established on the northeastern side of the city where Kashaw was earlier training recruits. You can see now that this late in the afternoon, most of the training has come to a halt, but Jarett is still in the process right now of instructing Kynan. Kynan has been given more standard Whitestone armor to get rid of the dark, roguish look that he had before, partially to help him mentally feel like he's in a different place and has some connection to the city. But Jarett is in the process now of working him through some swordplay. As you approach, the two of them stop and Jarett looks over towards you. "Ah, Vax, it is good to see you. What can we do for you?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, first, how's he coming along?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well he's a bit rough around the edges, but he's actually a pretty decently trained fighter."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'd agree with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kynan's quiet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm on de Rolo business right now. Can I borrow the boy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. Do you want to be borrowed?" "I suppose. Did I do anything?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you're fine. Take a walk with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need to head back to the castle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me just--" And he hands the blade over to Jarett, who takes it and sheathes it on the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jarett. He'll be back tomorrow for a little more, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. I shall prepare. Don't do anything stupid, boy." He smiles, and comes up and starts walking with you but keeps about a foot and a half, two feet between the two of you. He seems to still be putting a boundary there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey. Listen to me. I wanted to give you a little more time. I wanted to. And I don't think we have it. Things are moving fast. You didn't know what was going on. I don't fault you; I fault myself. That day you showed up-- look at me. I had a point, but I made sport of you while making it, and that is on me. And I'm sorry for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, too. I should have taken it for the lesson it was, and I was too dumb and young to "let it get through my thick skull."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, man. I'm a little bit older than you, but I'm a massive fucking shithead. I've made plenty of mistakes, and I only knew how easy it was for shit to blow up in your face, and now it has. Percival and I want to offer you a means of squaring yourself off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you need?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This city is in danger, and it needs people watching it, and I know you're training. Percy-- I'm sorry, Percival-- has a task for you, and I think it's well suited for you. You were around Ripley, you were around her other men, and you know how to use a sidearm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've toyed with it. I wouldn't say I'm a great shot, by any means."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here. We have guns now. We need people to use them, so I want you to come and talk to Percival for a bit, and we're going to work out a plan for you to show some people the ropes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Okay."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Water under the bridge, and I don't want to hear a word, just walk with me to de Rolo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Thank you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About this time, as you're having this discussion, you can hear the bounding of armored feet, and bursting through the partially open door you see, fully armored, eager, hair pulled back in a tight braid, big old maul scraping on the stone behind her. "All right. When are we doing this?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Does it

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why, what are you doing tomorrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's really quiet here. I'm getting extremely bored."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. You want to go now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, whenever you need to, I'm just saying--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could go now and camp there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll give Kik a chance to replenish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't see any difference in Raishan being able to kill us in our sleep here or there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She could stay in the shittiest room in the mansion, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's not getting in the mansion. She can go sit in the fucking snow and go to sleep, for all I care.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm very confused right now."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's only ten minutes now. It's only ten fucking minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The whole shebang, or just what we said right now? Just what we just said right now, just that? Great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, wait! Might as well test the waters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, yeah. Good. Nine minutes and counting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, hang on, whoa. I need some clarification here." The hammer slams down onto the stonework.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shut the door, lock it. This is not how I wanted this to go down, but apparently this is how it's happening-- wait a minute. Your boy is gone by now, right? We sent him out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) No, you guys were teaching him about the guns when she came back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You never know when it's out of character or in character--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mind you, he seems largely confused and doesn't seem to know what's going on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give me strength.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, quickly. Kima, we need to talk to you about something very important, and if it doesn't go well, Scanlan is going to erase your memory, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Excuse me?!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can do crazy things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, nobody's doing that to me!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course not, because you are so cool. Cool as a cucumber. We're in a bit of a predicament. We are going to Draconia so that you can fight not one but two dragons. Here's the thing: one of the dragons is here right now, is coming with us in disguise--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately the maul gets grabbed, she says, "Here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got eight more minutes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we don't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lady Kima. We, in order to kill one dragon, are entering into a deal with another.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Before we kill it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you crazy?!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, that's what I said.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pure stupidity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Obviously, yes!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hear him out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we do this, it could help us kill the dragon that killed Tiberius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you think you can trust this dragon?"

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come on, guys!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, look. The dragon is actually poisoned by a curse. She's very weak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great! Perfect!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We plan to take advantage of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why don't we kill the dragon here, and then kill the other dragon

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She'll fuck up Whitestone. It'll give us away. We have to get away from the city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lady Kima, you're looking at a group of idiots who have felled dragons, killed beholders, negotiated with sphinxes, gone to other realms and other planes, and somehow managed to get out of it more or less alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are a lucky bunch of sons-of-bitches, that I'll give to you!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what also this is like?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm keeping an eye on the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She leans on her hammer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is what this is like: this is just like the Underdark, with one exception. We worked with that fucking asshole thinking he might have some redeeming qualities and he didn't, he turned on us, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, and who told you that? Who told you that was going to happen? Who at the very first "moment you showed him to me said, 'This guy is going to try and kill you?'"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But on the side, he helped us get as far as he did, but then he got shot through the head, but that's water under the bridge!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven minutes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One dragon or two dragons? You want to play? Let's play.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And probably all die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, you're all going to die!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were ready to run with us, girl!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I'm coming with you, because I'm not going to let you die!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bahamut, are you serious? (scoffs) This is "ridiculous. I'm not going to tell anyone you made this plan until it's done, because this is "

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could be. But with you by our side, it has a slightly better chance of going correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, it does."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kimmy, can you be cool?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please don't call me that."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lil' Kim.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you be cool?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where's the dragon?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's in Draconia.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What about the one that's here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's hiding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hiding?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's going to show up after the fact. In Draconia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So this whole deal, you just don't trust me enough to tell me where the dragon's sleeping in "our place right now? You're all acting very weird."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We made a deal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's for your own protection. We can't tell you everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you go running off? What if you go try to kill it in here, and Whitestone gets destroyed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a temptation. Believe me, we know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But I'm also not stupid."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: After all we've been through--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've all almost died a hundred times.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're asking you to trust us blindly in this scenario, and I know that it's not ideal, but we have saved you before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Kima, please remember: between me and you, of all people, before we trusted the illithid, we trusted you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're right. I didn't trust you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was about to say--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They trusted you. I didn't. I'm getting to my point! But we grew past that, and now I trust you more implicitly than most people in this world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is precisely why you people need me!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She seems down. I think we should just get it on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing, though: you have to pretend like you don't know. It's super important.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right. Can you be cool?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're asking me to lie?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well. Pretend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not real good at lying."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about you just don't say anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That I can do."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Perfect. And don't attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I wipe her memory?

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Might be easier, at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You come near me with any sort of magic mumbo-jumbo, I'm going to clock you in the head, Scanlan."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lady Kima, I don't know what you're talking about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I love you, but I'm going to clock you in the head if you try and wipe my memory, little gnome."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kima. We've got three minutes left. Kima.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Until what?!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can choose any ten minutes he wants, really.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true. You know our mind, you know what our plan is. You're kind of a firebrand, do you think it might be better for you not to know-- you know now, but to not know going in and then you kill everything on sight when we're there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no idea what you're talking about, and this is really starting to frustrate me. Are "we going to kill a dragon?"

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're going to kill two dragons?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One to two dragons, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great, okay. What's the plan?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We leave tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We go where the dragon is, we're going to release bait. When the dragon is done with the bait, we go in and kill the dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, pretty much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then another dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe a third after that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we're totally weak, though, we can't fight the second dragon right away, we have to save up our strength and then fight her after so we don't die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not going to lie, I admire your drive and gusto. Just be smart about this."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Look at that, she says she can't lie, and there she did it so well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought you were gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm listening in to this whole thing through the earphone as I'm talking. That's how I keep telling you how long you have, because I'm laughing

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Well, then."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go talk to the Sun Tree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought we were going? We're leaving now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just gather your shit. I'll meet you there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: The Sun Tree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's our ticket there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't talk to anyone, Kima.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If we're leaving soon, I'm sticking with you guys."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to let Asum in on our plan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, Scanlan, could you wipe Kynan's memory, please?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kynan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, he's here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kynan didn't really hear anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I left with him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You left with him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't been in the room because I took him away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I redact that statement. Excellent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's why Percy left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I see. I was focused on the fire--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, no. I've walked Kynan to show him how I would like things to function.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and as you're listening in you gave him all the instruction and he takes it in pretty well. Jarett catches up with you, and you both coordinate with that. All right. You head to the Sun Tree while the rest of you gather the rest of your materials and supplies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to-- well, if we have time. I'm going to attune my cold-snap armor to me, so I'll probably not have my bracers attuned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that's two damage off any of your ranged attacks. So keep note of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I get, what, cold resistance and added AC, or something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to attune Animus and drop the gloves of missile snaring for this fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Free wet willies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you attune the weapon, there's a brief familiar dark glow on the weapon, and all the three names that exist on the barrel all dissipate. It's now a clean barrel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, all right. We'll have to have a talk about that. Is it all right if I let Asum know what our basic plan is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, that we're leaving now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're leaving now, we'll be heading there, the fight will be tomorrow. There will be a creature that we will lure and bait the white dragon with, we will attack at the end. We expect to see her participation. If we are not acutely aware of it, all deals are off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sounds good to me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I relay that information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Do you go to Asum's room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I knock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You knock on the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Asum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A voice goes, (shushes). You hear lowered voices from the other side of the door for a moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I walk away, assuming that Asum will know where to find me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I go back to gathering my things, pulling powder and shot out of what was necessary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. About ten minutes go by, and as you're gathering things Asum approaches. "I'm sorry, "Percy. I was indisposed."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I apologize. I hope I didn't disrupt anything important.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. I was keen enough to cover, but both the Cinder King and the Frigid Doom are under the "impression that there is no mounting danger."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tonight, we go to Draconia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tomorrow, we fight the dragon. We will bait him with another creature of great strength--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Might I ask what creature of great strength you intend to bait Vorugal with?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think anything you've ever heard of before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Try me."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What the hell. I pull out the book and show him the picture.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry. Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's Asum right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's confusing, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. There's a lot of gender issues in this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Reaching into the Abyss! That's curious."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figured that quite possibly, in private, you and I have the closest dispositions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can see that kinship, as well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once that fight has concluded, we mop up whatever is left. We expect to see your participation in some form. I understand if it can't be direct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can be of aid, I just have to remain inconspicuous. I cannot be seen to be part of this "confrontation."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Obviously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And all shall be fine."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We may have some extra people with us, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This was not discussed. Who would you intend to bring into this deal?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That, sadly, I cannot inform. Although there will be Draconians. They are disinterested in our politics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And disposable?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would hope not. But I understand your point of view. I will say for the sake of this encounter, our point of view will be dominant. But I understand and respect yours. When dealing with ants, you must respect the needs of ants. Surely you understand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I follow. All right."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would recommend not showing up in this form, at the very least.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, in this form? I have many forms I can take. I have an idea. Very well. Fetch me when "you're ready."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will be leaving on our own. You will have to meet us there. I'm sure getting to Draconia shouldn't be too much of a problem for you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why not travel with you and your band? That seems like a waste of magic."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It does, but sadly we are trying to keep our own reality quiet. The needs of ants. And also, they don't want you around. They don't trust you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I understand that, but if you're going now, it takes me at least three, four days of travel "over the ocean to get to Draconia."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Surely you can find a faster way. You got here very quickly. You so rarely lie that I'm so fascinated that when you do, I think I'm starting to get your tells, just a bit of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're a funny little man."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take that as the highest compliment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, then. I'll see you tomorrow."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See you tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Asum turns around and exits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I turn the corner, get far enough away, and drop to my knees and breathe deeply for a minute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Head to the Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys make your way to the Sun Tree. While you're walking, Keyleth, you head there, as well. Is there anything you wanted to do before they arrive?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I wanted to go underneath in our little Sun Tree cave that we carved out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you go beneath the tavern, into the basement, down into the little tunnel beneath that leads to the Sun Tree's roots.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. And I cast Commune with Nature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) There's so much pressure on this. Is there a way I can put my hand inside the Sun Tree?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's less of a merger and more as you touch and connect to the roots, your consciousness and the Sun Tree's consciousness can combine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're holding the roots.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dear diary--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Today I talked to the Sun Tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dear Sun Tree--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was so turgid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Turgid?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was an appropriate usage of the word! Very well done, very good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to cast Commune with Nature and try and connect with the Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You grab the roots and feel the warmth flow through your hands and there your consciousness connects with that of the Sun Tree, and you are both present in that same plant space.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sun Tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Been a while."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hey, Keyleth."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Without burning a question, can I personally ask you, how are you doing, man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Doing all right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A little cold, but... Whitestone."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, man, yeah. Hey, Sun Tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, Keyleth?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you're overtop all these arcane ley-lines across the whole globe, right? I've traveled a lot of places here lately. What are all the cities that the other arcane ley lines fall across?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't rightly know."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I sense it through the Sun Tree's roots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, as he converses with you, he says, "I've been here a long time. Don't really get "around much, being a tree." But you do feel this light, fuzzy, blue, almost like a mist energy, like a particle energy that is coalesced around Whitestone and above it, and it shoots off in six different directions, some that curl up northwards, some that curl out over the ocean, and you see them spider out in places and then go beyond your peripheral. The ley-lines only spider out past the Alabaster Sierras; you can't see much further than that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there any cities, any places of interest I can see that we've been through before, where they happen to cross?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me look at the specifics of Commune with Nature real fast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to see if I can use the Sun Tree to extend my vision a little further.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, the spell only lasts for up to three miles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I want to extend a little further?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sense that yes, these ley energies do travel much further and surround the world and make a network of various magical pathways, but unfortunately the Sun Tree and your vision right now doesn't go far beyond Whitestone. "Yeah. It isn't a lot."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So the ziggurat, the spinning orb of death that happens to be right underneath you, are you in touch with what that might be feeding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can't say I do."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it, Sun Tree! Goddamn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keyleth, calm down. I'm happy to answer your questions, invite you to my space. Just "because I'm not an all-seeing tree, don't be angry with me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not angry with

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Angry in general. Just chill."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's really easy for you to say, Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, it is." (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. All right. Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, Keyleth?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're a tree from Pelor, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "More or less."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have there been the attention of any other gods on Whitestone right now? That you can sense? Or can I sense? I'm asking the Sun Tree out of humor, but can I sense it? I'm assuming the tree doesn't actually know fucking shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tree may know a lot, just, the right questions need to be asked. The Sun Tree says, "To "be perfectly honest, Keyleth, even Pelor's grace left this place hundreds of years ago. His "presence is here in bits and pieces, but when I was first taking seed, the gods were much more "present, much easier to read. Kind of lonely nowadays."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so sad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know, Keyleth. I know."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got me, Sun Tree. I'm here. You shouldn't be lonely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "When you're around, Keyleth, nobody can be lonely."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww, that's so-- aww.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's saying that as you're holding on to his roots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't make it weird, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was weird five minutes ago, Matt!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, Sun Tree. I don't think I have much time left, but is there anything-- you said you're lonely. I just want to say if you ever want to talk, I'm here. You know you can confide in me. If there's anything you want to say, I'm all ears, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate that."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But when you do, hell yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I didn't really get any of the things I was looking for, Sun Tree, but I still feel a little better. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all that matters, Keyleth."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! You're cool, Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're cool too, girl."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww! Not as cool as you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Okay, I'm going to be walking through you here in a minute, so I wanted to let you know that there's going to be eight people going through, so don't feel alarmed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh boy."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does that hurt you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It tingles a little."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry. I'm not going to stop doing it, but I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Bye, Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bye, Keyleth."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Has anybody seen Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go up top, the whole group is gathered there, currently.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's downstairs with her wood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Did you have fun?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You seem way more relaxed than even an hour ago.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You smell of pine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And sap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep. I'll have whatever she's having.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we ready to do this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, before we go, Lady Kima. (singing) When the gnome hits your eye like a big pizza pie, you've been mind-melded! (speaking) I'm going to wipe her mind. It's too risky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of the whole conversation. It's too risky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a lot of mind--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope! It's a ten-minute conversation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten minutes, when he wants it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what's your spell DC on this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you didn't have your hand cone out, though, when you did it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Didn't I warn you, Scanlan Shorthalt, not to try and wipe my mind?!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (nervous laugh) This is how I die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm okay with this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I

lines.name: MATT
