lines.text: You take 35 points of damage. 27 of it blunt damage from the actual impact with the hammer; the rest of it's thunder damage. As her Holy Thunder Maul slams into the side of your head and sends you skidding ten feet across the ground, coming to a halt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That felt fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he deserved it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Damn right, he did."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, he had good-- there's a lot at stake--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax. Let it be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about we get through the tree before we talk anymore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I love you guys, but--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, no, he had that coming.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was a good swing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. I've been tense recently, anyway."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull the gnome up and cast Lay on Hands and give him ten hit points. You all right, buddy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groaning) You passed the test. You're worthy of coming with us on the journey.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can only apologize for him so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is true. Shall we get on with it?"

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're popping in far enough away, right? In the tree grove up above the chasm?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was that sideways tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sideways tree was where you came through, but you found a tree above that you could get to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I grew a tree, right? Didn't I grow some trees?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pick one of those trees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You finish your Transport Via Plants spell. The portal opens. You all begin darting through, Kima darts through. Who's the last one out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be the last one out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was darker in the day; it was starting to get later in the afternoon. Here, it is night. It is blustery. Not quite blizzard, but definitely a heavy snow. Decent wind, night, on the bluff right outside the ravine that dips down into the remnants of Draconia, and the small, icy throne that Vorugal currently calls home.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's find a place to hide the mansion and sleep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's night. You don't know what hour, but it's black night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can scry once we get in the mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you set us up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, yeah. I'll poof the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, quickly, I've attuned Whisper, and I've changed the Deathwalker's Ward to cold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's my armor class now that I've put the cold-snap armor on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had armor on before, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did, so is it up two points from that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. You guys enter the mansion. Kima comes in, looking around. "Well, that's pretty "damn swanky!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Shut the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shushes)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was going to show you to your room--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, well, then you can sleep in the fucking living room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fine. I've slept in worse."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. Servants! Don't help her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't need any help." She leans up against the side of the foyer wall and starts taking her armor off. She's keeping an eye on Scanlan the whole time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kima, there's extra rooms upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm good here."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you hungry at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I actually am pretty hungry, yeah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll find food for you. I go for the kitchen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you." What else do you guys want to get done in preparation for this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we want to have a Heroes' Feast because of the terror that dragons inflict upon all those who--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it prepared?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What else are we saving it for, other than this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I mean, she has to prepare it ahead of time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I cast it ahead of time? Sorry. Can I cast Heroes' Feast at a higher level?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah. But do you have it prepared?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I brought Transport via Plants. I can do it in the morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it uses one of your spells? Is that all right? I mean, it's pretty important.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is pretty important. Can I do it as a ritual spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think it works that way unless it says it's a ritual. Sorry. Yeah, Heroes' Feast is not a ritual, so you have to have it prepared.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do it tomorrow morning, or not at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to scry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What are you going to scry?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to necessarily scry on Vorugal, but can I scry in her--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She has guards. We also have the leader of the dragonborn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can see where

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Instead of spying on Vorugal?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who? What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wasn't the leader of the dragonborn a female, first of all? And wasn't Vorugal a male?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She was. Vorugal's a male.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tooma is the leader of the-- They're not Draconians. These are the Ravenites. Draconians were essentially wiped out. Ravenites currently hold the ravine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scry on Tooma.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can scry a few times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just so you're aware, you can only scry on someone on the same plane of existence, so you'll have to step outside the mansion to scry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. I'll step outside the mansion to scry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I step outside the mansion, and I take a good, hard look around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll sit in the door, and I'll keep an eye on this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, both you guys make perception checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm also going out there with them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm in the kitchen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey! 14.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the total on that for you, Vex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're a little chilly, and you're shaking naturally from the wind chill as you're preparing the ritual. You begin to focus on the scrying. Who are you scrying on, currently?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First, I'm going to scry on Tooma.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Darting through a number of familiar tunnels, you find yourself back to the small village that was built by the Ravenites, through the central circular opening where the small fountain was, and you're thrust into the tent where you first met Tooma. There you see upon the throne is Tooma with four guards around, currently draped over and asleep. Slowly snoring as her head droops.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's going on around her? Do people seem to be preparing for a battle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't really tell. You only have focus on her. You see very fuzzy things. There's not a lot of action around that you can tell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The scry finishes. Your fingers are now getting more cold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take the cloak and wrap it around as much as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Putting your flame hands to warm yourself up a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now, I'm going to scry on that outside entrance to Vorugal's lair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Vorugal's lair is in the open of the ravine. It's a little ways up.

lines.name: LARUA
lines.text: Yeah, remember, it's that raised ice platform.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where you guys are up on top, it goes down into the ravine, and the ravine curls through and splits off in different directions. In the center of where a section of the ravine forks off, in the center there is that cluster of ice with all the spikes off it on top of the rubble of one of the central islands of Draconia. That's where Vorugal is currently living.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, because we were in there earlier, so can I scry on the location? Not trying to focus necessarily on Vorugal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There will be guards at the guard stations all around the outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Generally, a particular creature you can choose from. I can let you scry on the location, but I'll have to make you roll for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that's dangerous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scrying on the dragon, or the location, or both?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Both. Anything near Vorugal, I feel like it's dangerous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not knowing could be more dangerous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus, Thordak has those scrying balls within the location.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did Vorugal have any other allies? Do you remember some of the guards?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just the guards, and it's not really allies at all. Everybody will turn the moment it looks--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I abandon the campaign and go back inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Anything else you guys wish to do to prepare for the evening, before the morning comes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm going to try to load the gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a dexterity check. Add your dexterity modifier to a d20 roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. You take a moment and take one of the pistols. The little barrel clicks out, and you go, "Oh!" You take--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's your dex save, not your dex modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Thank you. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11? You've seen Percy load a bunch, so you go and take this small bit of powder, put it in, put the bullet inside. It slides in, and it seems fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. That's it. Holstered.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Anything else, guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have to sleep it off. I feel terrible, so I'm just going to sleep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where exactly are we going to-- Do we have a plan on dropping this beast?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to tell Tooma to tell the dragon that they've found something to kill, and take him out into the wastelands where we're going to release it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we go try and talk to Tooma now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could send, I would say, Vax--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think Scanlan, Polymorphed, something very teeny.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's going on? Are we going to go talk to Tooma?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And let her know the plan of releasing--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you leave the safety of the mansion, you have the chance of being ambushed at any time by a fucking dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we all go as a group tomorrow? No?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we can't wander on down into Vorugal's territory.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far are we from Tooma?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very close.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why I said, if you Polymorph into a teeny, flying bug--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fly there. I can Polymorph you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can be invisible, as well, and I'm very sneaky.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could fly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dragons see a lot. A lot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, the dragon would know if I was really a mouse or not, though, as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not going near the dragon. We're going to see Tooma.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretty close to the dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, in the same area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe a half- to quarter-mile away from the entrance to Tooma's area.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got that Dust of Tracelessness?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stay low in the ravines, out of sight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know how to un-Polymorph myself. One of us has to talk, and you'll do the talking, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can drop Polymorph as long as you guys keep me in contact with the earpieces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll be out of range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hit us with the Dust of Tracelessness. You turn invisible. We'll hoof it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All of us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, just them. If they run into a problem--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're shit out of luck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are the earpieces going to stay in range?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not in a quarter-mile.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be safe. This is dangerous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't work from within the mansion to outside the mansion. It's a different plane of existence, technically.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I'm going to go Minxie form, my white snow-tiger, and I will stay within earshot range so that way if anything goes bad, I can alert the rest of the group.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you going to stay in earshot?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Earpieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just from the top of the cavern?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll follow as close as I can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With Dust of Tracelessness.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should be fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hit us, Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go without having some sort of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, the Dust of Tracelessness you sprinkle behind you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it gets rid of tracks. Makes you harder to track.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can cast Past Without a Trace on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make us both invisible, so we'll be plenty stealthy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And real quick, we've got to tell Tooma that we're coming? You don't think if we start attacking her dragon, she'll be like, "Oh! It's those fucks from two weeks ago!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not attacking the dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true. If we bust out the thing and then--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but they need their people all ready to attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We want them to know to stay clear, to not attack this thing if they can help it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, they might be able to tell us where we should release the beast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, they would know. They've been tracking down animals for it to hunt for a while.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a worthwhile risk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They have to tell him where to find it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going there right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, gather up. You, Scanlan, here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if Pass Without a Trace works if I'm not near you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think you have to cast it on yourself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll be invisible. It'll be fine. We're the best in the business. We walked around here completely without any stealth protection last time. We did fine, and we didn't even know anything about the culture or the people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but there was no dragon last time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can enhance one of y'all's abilities so you have advantage on rolls for a stat. I can do that to one of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe you should enhance my stealth ability.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I was thinking. I'm going to cast Enhance Ability, and that's a dex ability, the Cat's Grace or whatever it was? Cat's Grace on Scanlan. I'm going to turn into Minxie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I do the same? Does that stuff stack, or no? I could cast Bless, do the same thing, help with saves and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I Bless the three of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, thanks. I will give us both Invisibility, level three Invisibility.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Both of you go invisible. You turn Minxie. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to stealth as far behind them as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are all stealthing along the top of the ravine?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. The top of the ravine? In the ravine, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How are you getting down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Oh, it's steep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a cliff. It's the Grand Canyon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I shoot out the wings, and I glide Scanlan and I invisibly down to the bottom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys disappear down into the ravine. You lose eye contact with them once they're outside of 120 feet of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll stalk the top of the ravine and keep an ear open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And keep an eye out for anything that looks horrifying and bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Horrifying check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who, us? Her? Everyone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Either of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perception, you said? 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. All right. You glide down, and it takes you a moment, but you do, over the next 30 minutes or so it takes you to finally find the area that's familiar to you in this dark, that is where you guys previously were. You're having to look around for quite a bit, and it's a lot of having to go back up again and glide around. It's a big space, and in the dark, in the middle of the night, it's very difficult for you to figure out any sign of where you previously tread. You do manage to find it, but you're now looking at-- how long does Invisibility last?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you guys are about halfway through Invisibility's functionality.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And halfway through flying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha, make a survival wilderness check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to sit on the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A stoop?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do I use? Just nature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is wisdom survival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a few walking, appear to be sentries, haphazardly armed and armored. But it seems like the majority of those here are sleeping.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever we do, we don't want to scare the shit out of everybody and get attacked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Should we become visible, or wait until we get right up next to Tooma and then become visible?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we go visible now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Okay, yes, let's do it. I'll drop Invisibility.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys appear. Do you begin to walk toward the central--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, so is anyone awake?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we just hear quiet underground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a quiet, underground tunnel with a bunch of huts and tents and small abodes that are all silent. There are two wandering sentries that are armored. As soon as you begin walking through, they both turn and look, and see you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi. Hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spears out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fine. Yes, we're friends of Tooma. We've come to parlay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Put your weapons down."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have no weapons. I play fiddles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I see a sword at your side."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you like me to drop it to the floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Well, I'm already being asked to take off my belt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You, too."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're friends of Tooma. We have an important mission.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Persuasion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's an awkward three-minute beat where he's staring at both of you intently, with the spear out. Eventually the other guard comes back and talks back to him in a language you don't understand. (Draconic words)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, we don't speak this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should've gone. I really should've gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is a strange hour to drop by, but Tooma will see you. Leave your weapons where they lay."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to take good care of them? You're going to leave them there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They will stay where they lay."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Across the way, there's a small fire in the center of the room, a small fire pit that is largely burned out now to small embers. The smell of smoke and sage is very prominent and strong in the room. Tooma, you can see, is now cupping a small goblet made of simple wood. You see steam rising off of it, and she's sipping.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll leave this up to you, Mr. Reynolds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lady Tooma, sorry to wake you out of your slumber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is a very strange hour."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, where we come from, it's a totally different time. We've come to complete our promise to you. The fact that we are here should give you at least some confidence that we are men of our words.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye, it was close."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As a show of good faith, could you please instruct your guards to go get our weapons and bring them close to us? Not for any use, we just want them close by.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are not among enemies. Your weapons will stay where they are while we speak."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We really would like them close to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then you should leave."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Then we'll leave, and the dragon will torment your people forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is your choice."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We came with a whole fucking plan. Do you want to hear about it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would love to hear about it, but I do not talk to people who stumble into my home before the "sun rises with weapons and arms at their side."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are not trying to have weapons by our side, we want them close at hand. I don't trust them with people I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They will not be touched! Everyone is sleeping, foolish gnome."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We came to report, and we'll get out of here, all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here's the plan. We'll be quick so you can get back to sleep. Tomorrow morning, we're going to release a beast that will, we hope, lure the dragon out of its lair. We want you and your people at the ready to attack. Can that be done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That can be done, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And where would you recommend we release this beast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her eyes curl up with a slight, slick sound of older, not-as-moisturized lizard eyes. You see these eyelids click across as she thinks. "Across, to the northern side of the ravine, the ramp leads "up. Up that ramp, you will see a circle of stones, a hundred feet across. That should suffice."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get a whisper! Who will talk about Loot Crate?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, so many good things about Loot Crate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Friday the 13th. Halloween. Nightmare on Elm Street. Texas Chainsaw Massacre.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm a Halloween fan, myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any particular time that the dragon would be hungry for a hunt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hungry now, I'm sure."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And once this hunt happens, and hopefully weakens the dragon, will you be ready to pounce?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We will be ready."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. How do we get word to you that we're in position?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll be ready."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Anything else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The thing we're going to release is gnarly, so give it a little bit of space.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will tell my men."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, good chat. Scanlan, want to head back to the pad?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless you'd like to talk about anything else tonight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please, leave me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not a morning person? Evening person?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, let's go get our shit and get out of here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab him by the scruff of the neck and start pulling him out of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your weapons are right where you dropped them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (hyperventilating)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm so sorry, Simon. I should never have left you in there. Love you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way out toward where the cavern opens into the ravine itself. The snow is still a good foot and a half up now, up the ravine. What do you guys do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long has it been since I bamfed out the wings? An hour?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it's getting pretty close. You're not quite sure of the exact time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Start going up toward the ridge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hope this doesn't make us fall!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take the wind, the cold wind hitting the wings. Even though they're an extension of the armor, you feel this twinge of cold hit you. Thankfully you have your resistance up, so it's helping with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One more Invisibility for both of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for noting that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is intense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) His hand was like, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys invisibly coast up through the ravine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Thank you for noting that."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Making your way up onto the top of the cliffside, into a soft bank of snow. Keyleth, you do hear the (soft impact) of several footfalls maybe 40 feet to the left of you. You look over to see an indentation in the snow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I start pacing that way, assuming it's them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch Minxie emerge from the darkness and snow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (meows)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi, Random Cat Who Is Definitely Supposed To Be Part of This Landscape. Let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got this form from being in the mountains of my hometown, so yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we ride?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, can we get a lift?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can, probably. I'm little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both could ride Minxie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're massive, aren't you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They can ride me? I'm that big?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could carry them along.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (strained noises) Back hurts. Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we're going to leave the session for tonight. We'll be back here next week for whatever this chaos is going to be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you ready to rumble?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We've got Yenk the goristro coming in versus Vorugal, the Frigid Doom, versus Raishan, the Diseased Deceiver.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Diseased--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Diseased Deceiver.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Diseased Deceiver! Well, I'm going to write that down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing is going to go wrong. Everything is great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we set ourselves up for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we've got a really solid plan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two massive enemies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And an army.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, there's a really good chance that I won't be able to summon that thing, and then we'll have to improvise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, I didn't think about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Please

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or so great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or so great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use Enhance Ability to help him out with his spellcasting?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The thing has a DC. A very high DC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're probably pretty good because you have a high enough charisma. For you, Enhance Ability, let's see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you inspire yourself when you're casting a spell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, can I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me look at the rules for this. It should say on the scroll. What do you have to roll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't bring any of my stuff tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, Enhance Ability might help with that. It does give advantage on checks to the specific ability, which would be charisma. So it would be Eagle's Splendor, you would get advantage on charisma checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eagle's Splendor?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, they've got fancy names for each one, like Cat's Grace, Eagle's Splendor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And if this is an ability check, you could also inspire yourself with a d12.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Honey badger Spock, is that what you just said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, start thinking how you're going to handle this next week, guys. You've got a week to pull this together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we can talk this time!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. We're in the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys are having a whole night where you can work this out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, and I'm annoyed that I know what that perception check was about, and that Percy doesn't know. It really annoys me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys for watching. We'll be back here next week, on Thursday. Is it Thursday yet? [music]
